title: Global Logistics In Cannabis
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Logistics are an essential part of cannabis, but it's an area where people aren't looking. Yoram Eshel led supply chain and logistics at Teva and now runs Cannabilog, an Israeli company that closes the gap between growing, manufacturing and supply chain/logistics management. There are new and more elaborate regulations around ever evolving innovations in medical cannabis and there's a big gap in managing this in cannabis industry. Where regular pharma fails, cannabis steps in. Inter-state commerce, importing and exporting over global borders. Cannabis growth comes from the bottom up - unlike most other industries that grow from the top down. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
